## [Slicer](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer)

### Methods

|                                                                                      Method                                                                                       |                                            Return type                                            |                                                                         Brief description                                                                         |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [getBackgroundColorObject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#getBackgroundColorObject())                                                   | [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color)                    | Return the background [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color) of the slicer.                                               |
| [getColumnPosition()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#getColumnPosition())                                                                 | `Integer`                                                                                         | Returns the column position (relative to the data range of the slicer) on which the filter is applied in the slicer, or `null` if the column position is not set. |
| [getContainerInfo()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#getContainerInfo())                                                                   | [ContainerInfo](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/container-info)   | Gets information about where the slicer is positioned in the sheet.                                                                                               |
| [getFilterCriteria()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#getFilterCriteria())                                                                 | [FilterCriteria](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/filter-criteria) | Returns the filter criteria of the slicer, or `null` if the filter criteria is not set.                                                                           |
| [getRange()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#getRange())                                                                                   | [Range](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/range)                    | Gets the data range on which the slicer is applied to.                                                                                                            |
| [getTitle()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#getTitle())                                                                                   | `String`                                                                                          | Returns the title of the slicer.                                                                                                                                  |
| [getTitleHorizontalAlignment()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#getTitleHorizontalAlignment())                                             | `String`                                                                                          | Gets the horizontal alignment of the title.                                                                                                                       |
| [getTitleTextStyle()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#getTitleTextStyle())                                                                 | [TextStyle](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/text-style)           | Returns the text style of the slicer's title.                                                                                                                     |
| [isAppliedToPivotTables()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#isAppliedToPivotTables())                                                       | `Boolean`                                                                                         | Returns whether the given slicer is applied to pivot tables.                                                                                                      |
| [remove()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#remove())                                                                                       | `void`                                                                                            | Deletes the slicer.                                                                                                                                               |
| [setApplyToPivotTables(applyToPivotTables)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#setApplyToPivotTables(Boolean))                                | [Slicer](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer)                  | Sets if the given slicer should be applied to pivot tables in the worksheet.                                                                                      |
| [setBackgroundColor(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#setBackgroundColor(String))                                                    | [Slicer](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer)                  | Sets the background color of the slicer.                                                                                                                          |
| [setBackgroundColorObject(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#setBackgroundColorObject(Color))                                         | [Slicer](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer)                  | Sets the background [Color](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/color) of the slicer.                                                 |
| [setColumnFilterCriteria(columnPosition, filterCriteria)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#setColumnFilterCriteria(Integer,FilterCriteria)) | [Slicer](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer)                  | Sets the column index and filtering criteria of the slicer.                                                                                                       |
| [setPosition(anchorRowPos, anchorColPos, offsetX, offsetY)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#setPosition(Integer,Integer,Integer,Integer))  | [Slicer](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer)                  | Sets the position where the slicer appears on the sheet.                                                                                                          |
| [setRange(rangeApi)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#setRange(Range))                                                                      | [Slicer](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer)                  | Sets the data range on which the slicer is applied.                                                                                                               |
| [setTitle(title)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#setTitle(String))                                                                        | [Slicer](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer)                  | Sets the title of the slicer.                                                                                                                                     |
| [setTitleHorizontalAlignment(horizontalAlignment)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#setTitleHorizontalAlignment(String))                    | [Slicer](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer)                  | Sets the horizontal alignment of the title in the slicer.                                                                                                         |
| [setTitleTextStyle(textStyle)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer#setTitleTextStyle(TextStyle))                                               | [Slicer](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/slicer)                  | Sets the text style of the slicer.                                                                                                                                |
